user_query: I'm hosting a dinner party and I want to impress my guests with some interesting facts. Can you fetch a random joke from the 'Entertainment' category? Also, provide me with a joke about manatees and a dad joke. And while you're at it, check if there are any available categories of jokes.

TaskList.description: Fetch a list of available joke categories.
Get a random joke from the 'Entertainment' category.
Fetch a joke specifically about manatees.
